Ecology

    Introduction Research with Animal Movement Patterns UF in Kenya

Introduction

My main interests are in experimental high energy physics. In the past, I did some work exploring the connections between physics and ecology. During my undergraduate, I spent some time working with Trevor Caughlin and participated in UF in Kenya with Todd Palmer. On this website, I have documented these experiences.
